metadata.title: CVE-2018-20346 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: SQLite before 3.25.3, when the FTS3 extension is enabled, encounters aninteger overflow (and resultant buffer overflow) for FTS3 queries thatoccur after crafted changes to FTS3 shadow tables, allowing remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code by leveraging the ability to runarbitrary SQL statements (such as in certain WebSQL use cases), akaMagellan.

criterions.comment: sqlite3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
